title: go.talks/present does not render author name in title slide
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Checkout any revision of go.talks from 40efd5c773a2 on.
2. go install code.google.com/p/present
3. present & $BROWSER http://localhost:3999 in directory with a file containing:
`Title

Name
Institution
Address
State
email@address.net
http://code.google.com/p/project/

* Slide

Content
`

And follow slide link.

What is the expected output?

Browser window with the above text without email address and url.

What do you see instead?

Browser window with the above text without email address, url and author name. This can
be worked around by adding an additional blank line between the title and author name.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go1.0.3

Please provide any additional information below.
